body: We can't leave it out, it would require extensive changes in the fusion passes and the fusion compiler that we would just need to change back. I fixed _most_ of the onnx issues, I believe. Moving the ONNX passes out of the repo prevents fixing all of them.
body_html: We can't leave it out, it would require extensive changes in the fusion passes and the fusion compiler that we would just need to change back. I fixed most of the onnx issues, I believe. Moving the ONNX passes out of the repo prevents fixing all of them.
